msbt.message: Yo! I'm ! You're , right? Nice to meet you, .
Did you already get a tent?If not, you should totally head back to the plaza to get one. You're gonna need it out here.
Sofind a good place for a tent?I'm lookin' to pitch mine somewhere close to nature so I can train my body AND my soul, !

You already set up your tent, eh? I'm still tryin' to find the perfect spot.I'll be doin' some serious cardio, so it's gotta have lots of fresh air.I think this spot'll do the trick, but I dunno What do you think, ?
Looks good to me!
I'll find you a spot!
Maybe reconsider?
You think so? Awesome!OK then, how about we do a little visualization exercise together. If I put my tent here
Pretty cool, right?
Looks great!
Something seems off.
Alright! Looks like we have a winner! I'm gonna put down stakes right here and never look back, !
That was a tough decision. You totally saved my glutes!

Don't tell me you already helped out too?You're likelikea true champion!I just got here, so I don't have anything ready, but I'm gonna reward you for this once I'm settled in. Well, looks like it's time to sprint back to the plaza, !
I wonder how that is doing?She might be having as much trouble as I was, so maybe you should go see if she needs help.
Yeah, you're right. This is important. I should flex my brain and think real hard about where I want to live.
Oh? Not what you pictured?Guess I shouldn't rush a big decision like this. I'll think it over some more

What? You'll help me find a sweet spot to put this tent? Seriously?Wow! We just met and you're already doing some heavy lifting on our friendship, . OK, then Can't wait to see the epic spot you pick for me!
My tent is in your hands, . You got this.If you need me, I'll be over at the plaza visualizing how awesome island life is gonna be.
You're gonna decide where I live, !I totally trust you on this, bud. No matter what you decide, I promise not to whine about it.
My gut tells me this spot is pretty awesomeand my gut IS the smartest part of my bod.But do I trust it? Or should I pick somewhere else? What do you think, ?
This looks good.
I'll find you a spot!
Maybe reconsider?
This place is perfect! I can already imagine how my home gym's gonna look. Thanks, !Ohâ€”hey, if needs help, you should go over and give her a hand.
Hey, ! Find me a good place yet?
You know it!
I put up the tent!
Awesome! I can't wait to see it! Thanks, !
Finding me a place to livewow, thanks for spotting for me, !
Hey, if needs help like I did, you should give her a hand too.
I hope ends up with a spot at least half as mighty as mine!
